website_summaries.verdict: Though not as powerful or capable as higher-end models, if you are looking for affordable and basic, this is a good choice.
pros: An affordable model that's easy to use, in part because it doesn't require external power source
cons: Only has 2 ports, but suits most users' needs
Some issues using it with monitors have been reported – not enough power to boot them quickly or slow to switch

customer_reviews.title: Small but useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my friend, we play games with several devices (Xbox One, 360, Wii and Ps4). Now using this switcher, we can hook up every two output devices to one TV. To make the game life simple and comfortable, that's exactly what we need. The switcher is quality, and there are two green lights to show you which part is working. It also can be used on opposite direction of my devices, which means I can hook up one game device into two TVs or monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Zhaoran Yu

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy for her and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Received it right away, Thanks Amazon! Help my mom hook up on her ice cream store and she can just push the little button to switch devices. It's so easy for her and she loves it. She doesn't like the others HDMI switch that required a remote to switch the HDMI input, she think I should setup for all her friends.
customer_reviews.author: april q.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one because it added a small hdmi cable to use. This brought the device out further for me to attach to the wall mount directly behind the tv. I was worried that the hdmi outlet would grow week because every time we wanted to watch either cable or the fire stick we would have to unplug one or the other. This allows us just to push a button everything stays plugged in. Very cool idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed a splitter to add a firestick to our TV setup. With the cable DVR and Blueray player the 2 available ports were used up. In addition the placement of the HDMI ports required an extension which is included here. Most of the many splitters listed do not say "bi-directional" and seemed to be aimed mainly at adding extra displays to a device (1 in 2 out) which is the opposite of what I wanted. Installation was a snap and reception was perfect for both the Blueray and the Firestick. True couch potatoes may prefer a splitter with remote switching rather than the manual push-button on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Multi-skills

customer_reviews.title: Cant fit Firestick and HDMI input
customer_reviews.text: Im returning this item for the sole reason that you can not fit an Amazon firestick and a HDMI cable as the two inputs. There simply is not enough space to fit both. Just wanted to let you guys know if you had the same idea
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Could not use!
customer_reviews.text: This switch works as advertised. However, it does not work for my application. I had to install it in an area that is inaccessible, so I removed it and came up with a different fix. When I tried to send it back, Amazon was going to charge me $6 and change!!! That’s more than half of what I paid for the switch! I will now only buy those item that I really need and never again to “try” an item. Amazon might be the largest, but they are not the only game in town. I would have thought being a “Prime” member meant more!
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Dave

customer_reviews.title: Only fits normal sized hdmi cables
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Well made. Works well. Only negative is that you can only fit two normal hdmi cables next to each other. I wanted to use it for one hdmi cable and one Amazon fire stick which is wider and could not fit next to another cable. Had to order a triple hdmi splitter which works fine for the 2 items.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered! Except for poor product description.
customer_reviews.text: These kind of switches and splitters can be tricky. The manufacturers do a poor job of explaining their many uses to non-experts. Fortunately my background was just enough to help me understand that this particular item was exactly what I was looking for. Incredibly, dealers fail miserably to tout the best features of this quality item, namely that it converts TVs with only one HDMI input to two inputs, with no loss of picture or sound quality. Come on, people, tell potential buyers why they want this product. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Boy/ Madeline-wife

customer_reviews.title: Backfeeds equipment - unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this unit to switch between a Roku 3 and a DVD player. The DVD player had to be put in input 2, because the DVD player does not provide power over the HDMI cable. The Roku provides power, so it has to go to input 1, which requires power for the switch to work. When the Roku and the DVD player are both plugged into the switch, the power is back-fed into the DVD player, which then lights its display and tries to run, although it is turned off. That can't be good for the DVD player. I'm back to switching cables, instead of being able to use the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and works as advertised. The extra hdmi cord is great, though either the cord itself or the port is a little sensitive; the picture cut off a couple of times while I was positioning the splitter, but now that it's in position, I've had no problems. I go between Fios and Amazon firestick with a click of the button with this, and I did extensive testing to see if there was any drop off in picture or audio quality. The verdict was no drop off whatsoever. So really a 5 star review if it wasn't for the mentioned sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: A Photographer

customer_reviews.title: You may get a good one - check with a volt meter.
customer_reviews.text: This would've been great, except it seemed to have a power leak. Made the LEDs inside my lit computer case pulse/glow when the power was OFF. Caused fatal error and reboot. I disconnected it from PC. Then there was a power leak through the other side connected to Roku that blew my projector bulb after a few hours. It split the signal fine but something was very wrong. Seller, please take a look at quality control in manufacturing this item.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Not a "splitter" no dual screens
customer_reviews.text: So this is really a "HDMI switch" meaning one feed on and one feed off, not an HDMI splitter (as in able to have two screens showing the same thing at once). I feel like a lot of the reviews don't make that clear so there you go. I bought this thinking it was a splitter and kept it because it does actually save you time in switching between video feeds or say you don't have enough HDMI ports for your TV it gives you an extra option.
customer_reviews.author: Rex T. Paradox

customer_reviews.title: Great for running a PI
customer_reviews.text: Switching cables was becoming a hassle every time I would start up a new OS on my Raspberry Pi. This economical switch scratched that itch. I did notice one thing that held it back from 5 stars, there is a power leak through the switch that would keep a Pi from a full reboot if I left the HDMI cable hooked up and the switch toggled over to the computer screen. I am not sure if that is a fault of the switch or a common trait to HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not so great...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to switch between my work macbook and my home PC. I wanted to be able to push a few button and switch my video and peripherals over between devices. The device I got for my USB switching worked great. This one not so much. Only one of the two input ports worked. The single output to my monitor worked as well. But it fails as a switch when only one input can be plugged in... I got something from a local store and will be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Taco Demon Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Item does not work.  Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work. I connected everything the night I received this to verify that it worked. Plugged in the first device (laptop) to an HDMI computer monitor and seemed to work. Plugged in a second device (Chromecast) and switched to that channel. That worked. However, when I switched back to the 1st channel (laptop), it never displayed correctly again. Instead, there is a intermittently flashing screen of colored pixels. Tried every combination of disconnecting and reconnecting. Never worked again. This is being returned. Should have known the price was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Defective and destructive.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my three-way switcher that keep cutting signal randomly, every now and again. Plugged this in and no picture. Nothing from PS4, PS3, 360, or cable box. Went through 4 devices, 7 different HDMI cords, and it just doesn't work. Instead if busted a couple of my HDMI cords as I was trying to pull them out because the adapter is so tight.
customer_reviews.author: S. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this works in two directions makes me extremely happy. I purchased two, one for home and one for work. The one at home goes between two TVs in two different rooms so I can choose which tv to play in with my wireless controllers. There is little to no noise or degradation of quality in the picture or sound, and the one in the other room is connected to a 20 foot long hdmi cable. The one at work allows me to switch between two sources without having to unplug and replug another source over and over again. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Audio cuts out
customer_reviews.text: It's worked until I tried switching and it cut out audio for my PS4 when I switched between a samsung TV and an ACER monitor. The monitor has no speakers built in, but once I upgraded the monitor to a larger TV so that I was switching between 2 TVs with no other changes, everything works including the audio so for whatever reason it didn't like my regular monitor to the point of it cutting out audio to my regular TV unless I manually unplugged and then plugged back in the HDMI somewhere in stream. Happy it works for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not switch between two devices set at different resolutions.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this device will not switch between two devices set at different resolutions. I have a ps4 pro (2160p 4k) and an Xbox one (1080p) and it will not switch if the ps4 pro is set to 4K. Once I downscale ps4 pro to 1080p it works. I also tested it by connecting a firetv 4K instead of the xbox one, to have 2 4K devices and it worked as well. But as soon as one of the devices is set to a different resolution it will not switch to a higher resolution device. Very disappointing. If the seller can chime in and recommend a fix - if there’s any, I’d appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: azmp

customer_reviews.title: Switcher Failed to Perform Properly
customer_reviews.text: This switcher really looks great and hooks up very easily. Thank you for the 3' HDMI cable. I played my first Blue Ray DVD last night after attaching a VCR and DVD player to the two inputs and the provided cable output to the TV. The movie played crystal clear and functioned until 3/4 of the way through the movie. It then stopped providing the picture and sound to the TV. The DVD player was running but the switcher box ended the show and had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: requires power from both inputs to operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hook up two devices to one TV. The switch only works if the device plugged into slot #1 is powered on. I don’t want to power up both game systems, that’s why I bought a switch. So basically I am now swapping cables into slot one of this switch, instead of the back of my TV which has only one input.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, flawless operation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could use my new Amazon Firestick. I only have two HDMI ports on my old Sharp Aquos TV -- ports 4 and 5. 4 already had/has the cable digital converter box plugged into it. And Firesticks don't support ports numbered above 4. So I had to get a splitter like this. I bought a couple of cables, plugged everything into everything, and it all works perfectly. I have cable when I want it, and Firestick when I want it. All with the push of one button. And the respective remotes, of course.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Pockras

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt like Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these switches, thinking maybe i got a bad one, but i cannot get either of them to work consistently with an Xbox One. There is a very specific series of events that make it work once in a while, but i havent figured it out yet. Its some combination of powering TV, changing input, powering on Xbox in a different order, or delaying one step, or doing one step too fast, i just dont know. Works well with a PS4 though.
customer_reviews.author: JAA Hoaas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for Xbox & Roku
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect an Xbox 360 and Roku stick to a projector. I wanted something to toggle back and forth between each source easily. I may be using this wrong, but determined that the Roku port would not work unless the Xbox was turned on. When the Xbox turned off after awhile, I would lose my Roku signal altogether. Ended up not working out and will try something different.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have my computer connected to both my TV and my 23" monitor. Before I got this switch I had to leave my computer out of the opening in my desk so I could swap the cable back and forth between the TV and the monitor. Now I can slide the computer back into the opening in the desk and leave the switch on top of the case so it's much easier and neater. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is that sometimes when switching from monitor to TV I have to reboot the computer because the system jams but switching from TV to monitor works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Al J.

customer_reviews.title: Just a simple switch, but still unreliable
customer_reviews.text: HDMI switch boxes appear to be the bottom of the consumer electronics barrel. This would be the 3rd or 4th switcher I've owned in the last decade or more and they all fall to the same kind of faults; electronic or mechanical. Once or twice a week, I'll have to disconnect and reconnect the HDMI cables until whatever fault existed gets wiped clean either by operating the selector switch or moving the connectors. This simple box is no better than the more complicated electronic switching boxes.
customer_reviews.author: GeezerCaveman

customer_reviews.title: Made my gaming life easier for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if for some reason your tv only has one hdmi or in my case my pc monitor only has one hdmi. I prefer to play games on computer monitors due to less input lag. Used this so i can have both my pc and nintendo switch plugged into my monitor and at a simple button press i can switch between the two which is great considering i had to unplug one and plug another one in before. You have to supply your own hdmi cable that plugs into the monitor/tv yourself which shouldnt be hard. Theres always a spare hdmi cable laying around somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 and it worked fine for my Xbox One and Firestick. However I tried ordering another for another room and it didn't work, the screen has a flicker every little while and screen will completely black out at times. Since I had one that did work for me, I ordered a replacement. The replacement worked fine for a few minutes then it started with the same issue of flickering and blacking out. Now I will be sending this one back too and I won't giving this item another chance.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: Ports are too close together
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to using this product; I intended to use it to take away the annoyance of having to reach around the back of the TV to swap out HDMI cables. The problem is that the two side by side ports are too close to eachother, so I can’t plug in my Amazon FireStick and Roku. It would also be helpful if they added a reminder to buy (or included) a short HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This HDMI Switch is either defective or never worked from the factory!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say from the start by manual switching my HDMI plugs my system worked 100% ! With this switch installed the only thing that worked right was the computer TV/ monitor and that was before the first switch. When switched to my other TV about 12 feet away with quality HDMI cable it takes several times of switching before the video would transfer to the TV but with no audio, then when switched back to computer monitor the display was locked up until I re-booted. This Switch Is Complete JUNK!!! IMHO !
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but beware HDMI power transfer issues
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work okay, but I have concerns about it leaching power over HDMI between devices. For example, I had my Raspberry PI hooked up to this switch. When I tried to shutdown my Raspberry PI, it appeared to not turn off even after I disconnected its power supply. It turned out that the PI was getting power from the HDMI port. Some of the forums have expressed concern that this could be harmful to the Raspberry PI. While I understand they need to borrow a little power to run the switching circuits, I would have preferred there be better electrical isolation to prevent power transfer in this manner.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: This Is My 3rd Purchase... Because They Do The Job Well
customer_reviews.text: Whilst there are many options (light-grade aluminum housing, plastic, etc) out there I returned to this DotStone brand because I can attest to its performance over time. This is my 3rd purchase. I recently added a PS4 console and an Android TV box together and was running out of HDMI Ports on the TV. This solved the problem as I knew it would. Compact, durable, easy of use, it just makes sens to remain with something that has proven itself. Thank you DotStone.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work if streaming thru device
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because it appears to be a quality product, however, I want to caution anyone who may be looking for the same solution I was. I wanted to hook up my xbox and my Roku to one TV. It works until I try to watch streaming content. The screen just goes purple and says "Unauthorized HDCP" and only the sound comes through. I assume this is intentional and has something to do with copyrights etc, but this fact should be disclosed since I imagine a lot of people would be looking at this to connect a streaming device.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Won't work unless both devices are on.  :(
customer_reviews.text: I have two different gigs both from home and have to use a laptop for one & a desktop for the other. Multiple screens are a must!! I wanted to be able to switch the second screen back & forth between the desktop & the laptop, but if the laptop is closed because I am on gig #2 then the screen won't work. So it is pointless! Picture quality was fine maybe it would work to switch between two screens-- but not between two devices I ended up just getting a HDMI coupler & plugging it in to
customer_reviews.author: Pinktique

customer_reviews.title: swiching displays easily
customer_reviews.text: I have two monitors with my setup. One, the primary that is in landscape mode, the other in portrait mode that sits besides it. Often I bring a work laptop and need a 2nd monitor. This device allowed me to quickly connect the portrait monitor with my laptop and switch the display quickly. No power is needed, only hdmi cables. no issues so far. Been using it for several months. Will recommend to others if they have need for what this product offers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay.A

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I learned a valuable lesson the hard way. After hooking up a Google Chromecast to one HDMI port, I only had one left over for both my DirecTV and my Blu-ray player. I follishly bought a cheap splitter on Amazon without reading the reviews which in hindsight were very poor. While my DirecTV connection was fine, my Blu-ray player flickered. The only way it was good was if you unplugged DirecTV, which defeated the purpose of buying the splitter. I just hooked this up an it works great and is not that much more expensive! Next time I'll pay attention to the reviews!
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniel Patten III

customer_reviews.title: Only works sometimes not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Only works sometimes you have to switch the home wires around and play with it to get it to work. I have my ps4 and laptop connected to a bigger monitor and it would only work on ps4. When I switched hdmi cable the laptop worked but not the ps4 when I just pressed the button. It took me 20 min of playing with it to get it to work by just pressing the button like its supposed to. Can't really recommend something that doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Candido V

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but NOT with 4K
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for over a year and it's been great. I just got a Samsung 4k monitor today and it will not work with it. I have my Dell XPS laptop hooked up to this unit and then the until to the monitor. It goes in and out. I get a black screen, then it will come back, then it goes away. If I plug my laptop directly into the monitor it works flawlessly, so I know the issue is this switcher. Very bummed as it worked great with my 1080p monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: I can recommend this product, it's not expensive and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a small switcher box, well made with no remote and no active switching. I have a Cable box, Roku, and Dvd player. Like many other people only 2 HDMI inputs on my TV. Connected the Roku and Dvd player to the Switcher Box, and the box to the TV. 2 in ====[]---- 1 out to TV It worked great no lag, sound or picture problems. This switcher is small so Velcro would help to hold the box where you want it. I can recommend this product, it's not expensive and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent switch. Would work perfectly for switching between two ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent switch. Would work perfectly for switching between two basic HDMI devices, however it seems to have issues with HDCP with 4k. Example: with all new 4k rated cables, everything seems to work perfectly on my Xbox One S. However, upon launching TV, Hulu, Netflix, or Amazon, I get a blank screen (can still hear sound). If I unplug and plug the cable back in, I will get a picture, but that's not what I want. I used this splitter for a little over a month and not once did any of the above mentioned video apps work upon launch. I needed to unplug and replug the cables several times, each time. I recently unhooked it and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: E. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Roku Express (2017 model)
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work with the Roku Express (2017) that I bought in December of 2017. Image and sound just blink out for about a second or two at random intervals. Often enough (Once a minute, every few minutes) that it impacts ones ability to enjoy a program. Two stars (instead of one) because if it works with your devices, it's a great little package, no external power required, and seems quite sturdy. I guess that with a Roku Express, for some reason, such a switch needs to be powered.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin R Plettner

customer_reviews.title: happy digital camper
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little box. This is how easy and simple stuff used to be. I can run my pc and my ae console to my dvi to hdmi adapted pc screen. I see no need to update a perfectly good and big pc screen even if it is over a decade old. And if I wanted I could run my pc tlor console to 2 screens, just like they promise! The quality is clear and fine and fast. No noticeable delay or anything. Now, here's hoping it lasts a few years. Still, even if it only lasts a couple years, it is so cheap I can get 2 of them and still be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Samus Aran

customer_reviews.title: This switcher works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I could switch between my PS4 and laptop without having to plug and unplug things, wearing them out. This switcher works like a charm. There is a small delay when you press the button as it switches between the inputs, but it's ultimately negligible (it's somewhere between 1-3 seconds in my experience). Honestly, this is a great item to have to reduce desk clutter, and it's small size makes it able to be placed anywhere on your desk. I placed mine in the very back, but if you have the cables to allow it, you could probably place it right next to (or even on) your keyboard for easy switching.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z.

customer_reviews.title: Dotstone is quality!
customer_reviews.text: So here is my situation: I have a ps4 slim, an Intel Nuc Kit and a computer monitor that I hook it up them both up to. The monitor has no audio jack for sound, so I was stuck with using headphones on my controller. So I bought an extractor, a few hdmi cords, an audio cable, this hdmi switcher, and everything just works so smoothly now. I can easily switch between the playstation and my PC without having to unplug numerous cords and I get great audio and video with no degradation of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Jekyll

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: for some reason my switch works perfect for the video but have a little trouble getting the sound to switch. do not know that this is a switch problem or something else. will update this if I can figure it out. like the switch though. easy to use and comes ready to use. I am using it to switch from amazon video playing on the computer screen to amazon video playing on the tv
customer_reviews.author: ryobiguy

customer_reviews.title: Product works as expected
customer_reviews.text: My television had only 3 HDMI ports and I needed a 4th, so I purchased this product. The switch is selected manually by pushing a button which is what I wanted. Previously, I had purchased a switch that would automatically select which ever device it sensed was turned on. Unfortunately, my Roku box would also automatically turn on whenever it sensed that it's HDMI input was activate. I think these two automatic sensing devices conflicted with one another because both my Roku box and my automatic HDMI switch burned out very quickly. Therefore, be careful before purchasing an automatic HDMI switch.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Stromswold

customer_reviews.title: Switch not compatible with Denon 1000
customer_reviews.text: Bought this switch so that my cable box would feed one output to my Denon receiver and the other directly to my LG 4K TV. My Denon reciever is an older model that doesn't support 4K so was hoping to use the switch for 4K programming to feed my TV. For some reason the signal doesn't go through my receiver. Tried changing hdmi cables and switching ports, but it just won't pass through my receiver. If I remove the switch I'm able to see my cable box, so believe the switch is either faulty or isn't compatible with my Denon 1000
customer_reviews.author: saitosk

customer_reviews.title: works but no sound one one port
customer_reviews.text: i bought this since i have an older TV which I am not going to change just for additional HDMI ports. I found this and got it, i hooked up the Playstation on one side and Nitendo Switch on the other. my TV is old so picture quality is fine with me. I can't see a difference. But the sound is totally lost on one of the port. No sound at all. But when I directly connect the HDMI to the TV it works perfectly. I am not sure why but I just kept it and kept life simple with no audio... on one port and audio on the other.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing.
customer_reviews.text: The lights are not super bright, but you can see them during the day - they won't bother you at night even if it's right beside you. It's tiny but not flimsy, in any way. You could probably step on it really hard and not bother it. It's as sturdy as any guitar amp foot switch I've seen. The button is large and easy to find without having to look at it, if that makes sense. And it works without any extra power cable attached. I have the Nintendo Switch and the GPD XD Plus going into it and from there it goes out to my Xbox One S. (I use OneGuide and Mixer to broadcast.)
customer_reviews.author: VG Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This switch is perfect for what I need. I work from home and the company sent their equipment, including a computer. Well I only have one monitor and want to keep it that way. Not interested in buying a a second monitor. So after some research, I decided to try this little switch. Great price and easy install. Now with the press of a button, I'm able to switch screens between my personal screen and my work screen. Just what I needed and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy Nights

customer_reviews.title: HDCP fail
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about this issue and thought maybe issues raised were older and device had been updated. I have TIVO and after 15 minutes HDCP fail. Even worse, can't get TV to even work with TIVO with direct input. Oh, the issues this cheap device has caused me! UPDATE: Device not responsible for after-the-fact TV fail, got that fixed, but returned due to HDCP issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming, and Smart Boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to switch my PS4 from my PC Monitor to my TV, and it works perfectly. I experience no lag switching between the two. I also used it to connect both my PS4 and Xbox to my monitor, and switching between consoles shows no change in picture quality and lag. If you want to connect a console, or smart box(Apple TV, Roku etc) between two screens, or have multiple consoles to one screen, this will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Gerony Medina

customer_reviews.title: No signal loss in pass-through.
customer_reviews.text: I only have two HDMI inputs on my TV, one of which is needed for my satellite box and one for my DVD player. This meant that when I wanted to hook my laptop up to the TV to view streams I needed to unhook something. With this switchbox I can keep one HDMI cable open for the computer when I want it, and just have to push a button to use it. I was a bit concerned about signal loss from the DVD player going through, but there was not discernible degradation.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality; works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a splitter for an old(ish) HDTV that came equipped with only 2 HDMI ports. After setting it up, 2 inputs (PC + Console) to 1 output (TV) works like a charm. This particular model is well built with a metal body and supports bidirectional use, expanding its potential use case for the future. Can't speak to longevity yet, as I only got it recently, but if anything happens I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It worked excellent for three minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new monitor which only has one HDMI port so I could hook up my PC and PS4 and switch at the press of a button. It worked excellent for three minutes, but now my screen goes black about every 30 - 60 seconds for 1 - 2 seconds. I continued to use this for another 20 minutes thinking it was just situating itself, but it never stopped even whenever I unplugged one of the HDMI inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ray

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to run a second signal to another TV with a HDMI signal then this will solve the problem to switch between the TVs. This is a switcher and you get to watch one TV or the other... simple. I have another TV in a different room and what to be able to see the news and this switch along with a 40 foot HDMI cable (bought from another source) solved the problem and no interruptions or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Koehler

customer_reviews.title: This HDMI switch leaks power to the other computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this HDMI switch to connect two computers to one monitor, but it leaks power from #1 computer to #2 computer causing the power button to light up, while the #2 computer is still shut down. I asked the seller to see if it is defective, but they said it is normal. I don't buy it, so I ordered another switch with different brand, it worked like a champ. So it is either defective (but seller won't honor warranty because the return window is passed) or faulty design. I won't recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Well built and works as described
customer_reviews.text: This switch does exactly what it says it does. My use case is two outputs from my video card going to two monitors for work, and switching to two different monitors for gaming. The switch is substantial, has a metal casing, the physical switching button seems solid, and the HDMI connectors are snug but not overly so. I used some double-sided tape to mount them to the top of my PC case because they are so light they get dragged around by the weight of the HDMI cables. I'm hoping they will hold up over time, but they are doing the job very well for now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian_254

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for long.
customer_reviews.text: Switched the HDMI good until it didn’t. Only able to use it for a few months. It was switched on a daily basis and I used high quality HDMI pre-made cables, yet it did not last. It came with a crack in the case but worked, and I needed it, so I kept it. Looking back on it, I should have sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: STR8NLVL

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and it works
customer_reviews.text: All of my hdmi ports were in use but my wife likes to look at the pictures on her digital camera on the tv so I would have to unplug the Apple TV hdmi Cable and attach the camera cable to that hdmi cable using a female to female connector. After installing the switch, she can plug the camera cable into her camera which already has the hdmi end plugged into the switch and just press the button on the switch to view her pictures on the tv. The switch works great, was inexpensive and does not need a power source.
customer_reviews.author: Jack of All

customer_reviews.title: Out of HDMIs on your TV?? Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy solution to a very common problem. I just bought my 3 year old son a Nintendo Switch. He currently has a WII U and does not want to part with it. This switch made it all possible as we are out of HDMI connections to our TV. I used this switch for the two Nintendo consoles to the TV. Works perfectly! Press the button to switch between consoles. Even has a light to show which console is being used. I would def recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Al Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great hdmi switcher with limited ports
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great little switcher so far. Needed an extra port and this has work flawless. Use it to run my fire stick and 4k player. As other say it doesn't fit for firestick they are correct, but in firestick box they have an adapter that will allow it to fit. No issues here. If I need another port I will definitely by another one.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews by Dee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, versatile, effective
customer_reviews.text: This switch replaces an electronic 3-way switch that died after less than a year. The 3-way switch was connected to another Dot Stone Bi-directional switch which splits the satellite receiver between my tv and my monitor. I added this second switch to combine the satellite receiver signal and the computer onto my monitor. This way, I can watch tv on a tiny 17" display or on a 24" HD monitor. The mechanical switch is definitely more reliable and has lasted longer than the electronic switch.
customer_reviews.author: Ragged Clown

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Charm!
customer_reviews.text: The splitter works like a charm. Easy to install, easy to use, no issues since purchase. I recommend it for anyone who needs an extra hdmi port. My only gripe is that I thought it came with an hdmi cable, not a big issue as the price was perfect and the unit is really what I needed. FYI, it appears to be well built and it was well packaged by the company for shipping. I do recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Riley

customer_reviews.title: Backfeed issuess
customer_reviews.text: Device causes distortion inn picture quality with connection to a DirecTV box Device causes issues with a Raspberry Pi 4, never use this for this device. Seems to be a backfeed issue with this spiltter, hopefully they have fixed it since I got it back in 2017
customer_reviews.author: Smozk

customer_reviews.title: Awkward cord positioning
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return this but the return window had expired before I put this to use. It works fine, but the positioning of the cords makes it difficult to use. You need access to the button to switch ports so it needs to be available, thus on the tv stand. The problem is the input is on one side and the output on the other so you have cords all over the place. Need a design with all input and output on the back so the front is visible and the cords can run behind the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Causes Flashing on Screen
customer_reviews.text: Installed this with two inputs and one output to the TV. Individually each input works fine going to the television, but install this switch and no matter which input is selected you get constant fast flashing and horizontal lines across the screen. It's really not worth the effort to send it back at this price, so I just ordered a switch from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Scott

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our motorhome. The TV is built into a cabinet making it difficult to access the HDMI port. We attached the HDMI cable that was already connected to the TV to this adapter. This allows us to connect 2 more HDMI devices. Our grandkids can use their game controller and we used 2nd one for a Firestick.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Simons

customer_reviews.title: Signal loss using the HDMI switch
customer_reviews.text: I used the switcher to connect the HDMI feed from a ROKU and a DVD player to the video input of a BOSE home theater system. The video feed from the ROKU experienced periodic signal loss that caused the TV to emit a flash of a green screen. When I disconnected the ROKU from the switch and ran it directly to the BOSE, I no longer experienced the signal loss. I am going to search for another solution to my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Splitter was virtually a plug and play as advertised. Used it to connect with an older TV, that had only 1 HDMI input port, with 2 input sources. A cable box and an Amazon TV Fire Stick. With the push of a button you can toggle back and forth between the 2 different inputs. Works perfectly. Only drawback was thai I needed an additional HDMI cable to go between the splitter and the TV input port.
customer_reviews.author: John from Belvidere, NJ

customer_reviews.title: 2 computers 1 monitor
customer_reviews.text: I needed to share a monitor between 2 computers. This switch does the trick. I was a little worried about leaving both computers powered up when I did the switch, but this is not a problem at all. The screen goes blank for a second or 2, then up pops the other computer's display. Bothe computers run Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Edited:  didn't work in my application
customer_reviews.text: Only one of the two screens will activate, which obviously defeats the purpose. I planned to use it with a chrome box so maybe that's the problem, it being less sophisticated than a pc. In any case I didn't bother sending it back. I switch infrequently enough that I can just get by without it. UPDATE: One of my cables was HDMI to digital monitor. When I changed to HDMI on both sides it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Colton

customer_reviews.title: *UPDATE * Perfect
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: worked fine with my 42" and 32" displays, however, when I updated my 32" to a second 42" it stopped transmitting to both displays simultaneously. It'll transmit to either display by itself, but not simultaneously like it used to. I think I might need a powered switch because of the bigger display maybe ??? Works perfect, as intended. I have it attached to my home surveillance DVR. I use it to switch between the downstairs display and the upstairs display.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This non-techie was finally able to utilize the DotStone HDMI Switch Bi-Direction 4K HDMI Splitter after a few tries & help from a YouTube video, & it works well. I can now switch between my DVD player & ROKU without the inconvenience of having to switch the HDMI cable from one device to the other. A drawback with this product is that the info that comes with the switch wasn't sufficient for a non-techie to accomplish set up easily.
customer_reviews.author: PKS

customer_reviews.title: Issue switching from a projector to a monitor - black screen
customer_reviews.text: When switching from a projector back to a monitor, there is no signal and the monitor just shows a black screen. If I unplug and re-plug the monitor, the screen comes on but as soon as I switch to the projector and back I am left with a black screen. It's as if the computer still thinks it's projecting on the monitor and no display change is recognized. Because of this issue, the switch is useless in my case and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Samsubg QLED Smart TVs
customer_reviews.text: This does not worknwithbSamsubg Smart TVs. The 6,7,8 QLED TVs identify the HDMI product connected to the interface. When you switch from one HDMI connecton to another, Samsung does not recognize that it needs to rediscover the device therefore it gets hung! It does not know how to operate the other connection and cannot view the display. UPDATE; I bought these for another Samsung non QLED TV I had and it worked fine there!
customer_reviews.author: Berns

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected 99% of the time
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally get some issues where the signal isn't coming through on the one it's supposed to, and so I have to flick the button twice to switch the signal and come back and then it'll work. On top of that, sometime you have to click the button firmly to get it to switch otherwise it doesn't when you think it did. Other than those situations, this works as expected and as advertised - it solved a huge headache for me so it was definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It was actually smaller than I expected, which is nice. It came in very simple packaging, all the directions you need printed on the top of the box. The device itself is chunky, it has a heavy feel to it from what I assume is a steel casing. The switch has a very nice tactile feel to it so you can know for sure when you have pushed it. Worked with no issues out of the box and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Trent

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and is small and compact. I use it to connect two computers to one monitor. Someone mentioned that the switch seems flimsy. It's a button, and it works. Doesn't feel flimsy to me. The two lights that show which channel is in use are very helpful. Time will tell as far as reliability is concerned. I've only used it for a little while but will update if there are any problems during the first year.
customer_reviews.author: BSquared18

customer_reviews.title: Started dropping sound after a couple of days
customer_reviews.text: When I first set this up, I thought it was all good. I had it set up so I could transmit from my computer or a Roku to my TV. When I used it for the computer it worked fine. When I used it for the Roku it worked fine, for 2 days -- then the sound kept dropping out for a second about every 15 seconds. I took out the switch and connected the Roku directly and the sound was fine. :-|
customer_reviews.author: Now Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to. Wish I spent more on one with a remote but that's really just due to laziness and not an issue with the product. If anyone tries to use this as a coupler (In my case I didn't want to buy a longer cord for a temporary projector setup), it will only work when there is something plugged in to each port. I just plugged a right angle adapter into the unused port and this worked great as a temporary coupler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hallaluah!  This one works with Cox Contour Cable Box!
customer_reviews.text: After having gone through several of these type devices (the last one at 4 times the price), found this one that actually works with the Cox Contour cable box! Wanted a switch to send either my BluRay player or my Cox cable box through a single HDMI that runs down through my wall. Wanted to avoid an additional cable running to my TV. Hooked up and instantly had my cable signal on the TV. Happiness!
customer_reviews.author: Fergdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to accommodate PS4 and Nintendo Switch on an older TV with only 2 HDMIs
customer_reviews.text: This adapter allowed for us to toggle both Nintendo Switch and PS4 on our older plasma TV since it only has two HDMI inputs and one was dedicated to the cable box. It is simple to use by flipping the adaptor’s switch from side to side to direct the HDMI power to whichever device you want to play. The price was reasonable and it overcame our minor problem of one less HDMI than we needed.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for my setup
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my setup. I have a desktop gaming computer and a laptop with a web cam. I use the same mouse and keyboard for both using a separate switcher. I use this to give my laptop a split-screen if I need the extra space. I bought it this way because it was cheaper to get this and the keyboard/mouse switcher than an integrated KVM. I figured hitting two buttons when I wanted to switch was easily within my capabilities. It turns out that I like this a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Recluse

customer_reviews.title: Functional, inexpensive and simple but ugly once cables are plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot speak to the "Ultra HD 4K 3D 1080P for PS4 Xbox Fire Stick Roku" quality. Connecting medium quality components (television, DVD player, cable television set top box), it works perfectly. Simple, mechanical feeling button, no remote to lose, unequivocal green indicator lights. Perfect for the 90+ year old user. Downside is that the cables come out opposite ends making this setup bulky and ugly. And since it is manual operation, you cannot conceal it.
customer_reviews.author: Matsuoka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm switching between DVD player and Fire Stick. The included HDMI was just the one needed to plug to the TV and the Player and Stick HDMIs to the switch supplying the power.
customer_reviews.author: tyyang3

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive solution.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a simple solution to my problem: No hdmi on my PC which serves as a DVR for OTA broadcasts. With an DVI/HDMI adapter and this gem I can switch between my new smart TV and PC monitor. I pass the sound through a digital coaxial cable to my Onkyo receiver. Notes: this does not give me two screens simultaneously which is not what I was looking for. Bi-directional option gives you the input and output where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Leave the TV remote in the drawer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister who is very electronically challenged. It works quite simply. In her case, I plugged in her DVD and DVR (from the satellite provider) and the other end to the TV. Now all she has to do to switch between the two is push a single button and she can leave the TV remote in the drawer. You’ll need three HDMI cables and you likely already have two.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S. Loftis

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution for difficult problems.
customer_reviews.text: This proved to be an easy solution to a difficult problem. I have a Yamaha surround sound 5 speaker system that I use. My wife for everyday cable TV is satisfied with just the no hassle 55 inch Samsung TV speakers. This push button switch allows me to enjoy what I want and one press of the button goes back to cable box that my wife finds easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Graves

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I have this connected to my Xbox one and Nintendo Switch so I don't have to keep changing my HDMI cable on the TV. I have one cable coming from the TV into this thing and the two systems plugged into it as well. It has been working really well. You have to press this little button to switch between the two systems but that is not a big deal. I have seen no issues with the quality of video or gaming. I have been using it for a few weeks now and still no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Evlpanduh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value even for ONLY an HDMI cord
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me as a solution to switching hdmi cords out of the back of my rx480 when switching from monitor to TV or VR. I give 4 stars because there is a small complication in the nature of how the switch /splitter works however, widows 10 thinks both monitors are plugged in at the same time and that complicates my multi monitor setup. This was easily solved with a boot of reconfiguring and every once in a while I have to win key+shift+right arrow a window onto the correct screen. I think this is a small complication to the value of not interacting with the back of my pc or expensive video card.
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: 2 Wide ended HDMI cables likely won't fit on the double side
customer_reviews.text: Warning MacGyver fix may be required works for me .. it may not for other less MacGyver types ! I found that my two HDMI cable ends were too wide to allow them both to be inserted on the double side simultaneously. So I pried the metal closure of my HDMI cables open, cut away the excess on the right of one cable and the left side of the other cable, tossed that metal closure and duct taped my HDMI cable ends closed instead . Presto they now will both fit simultaneously. ...did not need to return and proceeded to get my hookup working
customer_reviews.author: Mike Denn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works. In my case, there are two video sources: a PC and a Google Chromecast. I use the switch to route the video signal from either device to a single monitor. I normally select the video signal from the PC to the monitor. Whenever I want to watch a program, such as Netflix, from my phone via Chromecast, I switch to Chromecast.
customer_reviews.author: Anjiso

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Works wth HDMI-ARC & HDR! My Vizio M65D0 has only one HDMI that supports 4K HDR and ARC. I need to connect it to the Vizio soundbar and to Xbox One s. To get both 4K HDR from XBox and ARC with Soundbar working via HDMI only, I tried a few similar products and this is the only one working. The only extra effort is to press the button to switch. I wish they make a remote for it. My advise is that press the button to switch before powering on both devices.
customer_reviews.author: superJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just plugged and play and I was able to easily switch between the Xbox and the Nintendo switch. Have had it for a couple of months without issue. I only wish that the light wasn't on all of the time, it makes for a bright room at night when all other lights are off. Update: it worked great for a few months but then the signal quality became horrible and had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Performs as I need
customer_reviews.text: Performs exactly as I needed. One PS4 (non 4K) for two different (non 4K) televisions. When seated in my office chair at my desk, I use it for my smaller tv. When in the recliner in the office, I use it for the large tv. Thus far, it has functioned flawlessly. I specified that none of the devices are 4K so as to provide exact information for those considering purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bluestew

customer_reviews.title: Just did not work
customer_reviews.text: If I go downstairs to exercise, I don't need the stereo to watch TV. However, if watch a movie on HBO, I want the stereo. I used the one port to plug into the cable box. I plugged the other two ports into the stereo (that is already plugged into the TV on HDMI 2) and to the TV on HDMI 1. The signal degraded terribly and I just can't use this device.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI switch controller is perfect for my needs. My flat screen TV bnb is old and it only has two HDMI ports. One of the ports is damaged so that there is a poor connection between TV and aux. Device (DVD, etc). Your simple device allows me to connect aux devices ( DVD and cable box ) into your switch and have the output go into the one working HDMI port on the TV. Thanks again. David Steven's Naples, Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Signal10

customer_reviews.title: One monitor, two HDMI, buy this then.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Running the Xbox and computer to one monitor with one HDMI. This is a great, simple fix. Plug in the two HDMIs, then one to the monitor, then click to switch. The switch is nice. Round button that goes in for one and pops out for two. You click it and know that you clicked it. Not sure how to fully explain that, but you'll know what I mean once you hook it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Study, works great if you need it.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with HDMI cable(s)! Box is metal and is solid, the button feels sturdy, and if I had figured out my 2 computer configuration beforehand, I wouldn't have needed to order one.. let-alone two of these things. I'm sure I'll figure out a use for them in the future, but for now.. they're just collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Deebo
